about_the_game:
Story
Lonely night
You sit on the sofa in front of the TV in the dark living room, recalling your girlfriends.
Although you found a video that helped recollection, but someone was hidden a photo of the thumbnail video with black paper!
Is it your sister's prank?
It doesn't know what's what, but your desire can't finish here.
There is no choice but it needs to restore the hidden thumbnail photos.

Introduction
  • Gold Wiper is an arcade game like Qix and Gals Panic.
  • If you delete the screen and restore the hidden picture, you will be rewarded incomparably with Qix and Gals Panic.

How to play the game
  • The player restores the hidden picture while delete the screen within the given time.
  • While restoring the hidden pictures, you will be disturbed by bosses and subordinates who have unique skills.
  • One of avoid disturbances is use the player's skills.
  • Avoid disturbance and restore the hidden picture.
  • Satisfy your joy by earning rewarded videos!

Key Features
  • 3 female friends embodied in 3D
  • 30 stages with a boss and minions who have unique skills.
  • 30 adult video records given as rewards.

content_descriptors.notes:

- Not suitable for watching at work
- Not suitable for all ages
- All characters in the game are over 18 years old

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-3570
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7700 or AMD Ryzen 2500X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
